about_the_game:
If you had a great time playing the game and want to help fuel the creation of even more exciting projects, we invite you to consider purchasing this DLC.

As a token of appreciation, your purchase of this DLC will earn you an exclusive leaderboard banner that showcases your unwavering support for the game and its future.



And if you're feeling especially generous, you can your support by either purchasing or simply adding any of our upcoming projects to your wishlist. Your contribution will make possible the release of new projects. Thank you in advance for your support!
detailed_description:
Join the community!


About the Game

If you had a great time playing the game and want to help fuel the creation of even more exciting projects, we invite you to consider purchasing this DLC.

As a token of appreciation, your purchase of this DLC will earn you an exclusive leaderboard banner that showcases your unwavering support for the game and its future.



And if you're feeling especially generous, you can your support by either purchasing or simply adding any of our upcoming projects to your wishlist. Your contribution will make possible the release of new projects. Thank you in advance for your support!
